description.other_contributors: Jacquie Garton-Smith, Royal Perth Hospital and DoHWA, Australia
Jodie Pycroft, Adelaide Northern Division of General Practice Ltd, Australia
Gordon Tomes, Australian Institute of Health and Welfare, Australia
Kylie Young, The Royal Australian College of General Practitioners, Australia
description.other_details: Based on NEHTA Medication action archetype http://dcm.nehta.org.au/ckm/#showArchetype_1013.1.876_6 NEHTA Therapeutic Good Use Datagroup http://nehta.gov.au/data-group-library/data-specifications/dgl-therapeutic-good-action

details.purpose: *The recording of activities undertaken with regard to a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good and linking to the instruction if appropriate.
details.use:
*For recording the planning, issuing of a prescription, dispensing, administration, cessation, suspension, completion of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good . This will usually be in response to a medication order but may be administered immediately without an order at times, thus requiring recording of the administration alone (e.g. in an emergency situation).
Such a record may be made to indicate the administration of a dose, dispensing of a certain quantity or as a record of ceasing a medication. The state of the medication instruction is altered by the action taken as indicated in the Pathway definition.
There is a date and time at which this ACTION took place (as there is for all ACTIONs) and use of this archetype indicates that some action has actually occurred.
details.misuse: *Do not use when recording an instruction or order (use INSTRUCTION.medication).

details.purpose: The recording of activities undertaken with regard to a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good and linking to the instruction if appropriate.
details.use:
For recording the planning, issuing of a prescription, dispensing, administration, cessation, suspension, completion of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good . This will usually be in response to a medication order but may be administered immediately without an order at times, thus requiring recording of the administration alone (e.g. in an emergency situation).
Such a record may be made to indicate the administration of a dose, dispensing of a certain quantity or as a record of ceasing a medication. The state of the medication instruction is altered by the action taken as indicated in the Pathway definition.
There is a date and time at which this ACTION took place (as there is for all ACTIONs) and use of this archetype indicates that some action has actually occurred.
details.misuse: Do not use when recording an instruction or order (use INSTRUCTION.medication).

details.purpose: этот архетип класса ДЕЙСТВИЕ позволяет записывать активность, связанную с введением лекарств или применением лечения. Обычно такая активность возникает в ответ на назначение лекарства врачом, но также может быть при самолечении или лечении по совету аптекаря. Информация о времени приема отсутствует, так как использование данного архетипа предполагает, что действие произведено в настоящий момент времени.
details.use:
*For recording the planning, issuing of a prescription, dispensing, administration, cessation, suspension, completion of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good . This will usually be in response to a medication order but may be administered immediately without an order at times, thus requiring recording of the administration alone (e.g. in an emergency situation).
Such a record may be made to indicate the administration of a dose, dispensing of a certain quantity or as a record of ceasing a medication. The state of the medication instruction is altered by the action taken as indicated in the Pathway definition.
There is a date and time at which this ACTION took place (as there is for all ACTIONs) and use of this archetype indicates that some action has actually occurred.(en)
details.misuse: *Do not use when recording an instruction or order (use INSTRUCTION.medication).(en)

details.purpose: يُمَكِّن هذا الفعل من تسجيل الأفعال التي يتم تنفيذها فيما يتعلق بالأدوية. و عادة ما يكون ذلك استجابة لأمر دوائي أو وصفة دوائية, و لكنه قد يكون إما قام المريض بتناوله بنفسه أو عن طريق الصيدلية. لا يوجد في هذا النموذج تفاصيل حول الوقت حيث إنه يشير إلى فعل تم في الواقع.
details.use:
*For recording the planning, issuing of a prescription, dispensing, administration, cessation, suspension, completion of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good . This will usually be in response to a medication order but may be administered immediately without an order at times, thus requiring recording of the administration alone (e.g. in an emergency situation).
Such a record may be made to indicate the administration of a dose, dispensing of a certain quantity or as a record of ceasing a medication. The state of the medication instruction is altered by the action taken as indicated in the Pathway definition.
There is a date and time at which this ACTION took place (as there is for all ACTIONs) and use of this archetype indicates that some action has actually occurred.(en)
details.misuse: *Do not use when recording an instruction or order (use INSTRUCTION.medication).(en)

details.purpose: Este ACTION permite la grabación de las ordenes de prescripciones. Esto será normalmente en respuesta a una orden de medicación o prescripción, pero puede ser autoadministrado o suministrada por una farmacia. No existe informacion sobre si el uso de este arquetipo implica que alguna accion haya efectivamente sido ejecutada
details.use:
*For recording the planning, issuing of a prescription, dispensing, administration, cessation, suspension, completion of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good . This will usually be in response to a medication order but may be administered immediately without an order at times, thus requiring recording of the administration alone (e.g. in an emergency situation).
Such a record may be made to indicate the administration of a dose, dispensing of a certain quantity or as a record of ceasing a medication. The state of the medication instruction is altered by the action taken as indicated in the Pathway definition.
There is a date and time at which this ACTION took place (as there is for all ACTIONs) and use of this archetype indicates that some action has actually occurred.(en)

items.items: Details of use, administration, dispensing or other care step relating to a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good which may arise from an instruction from a clinician.
The medication is planned but no execution has taken place.
The instruction has issued as an item on a prescription.
The medication has been taken by the patient for the first time.
A single administration of the medication has taken place.
The medication has been completed as instructed.
The medication has not been dispensed as supply is not yet available.
The administration of the medication has been suspended.
The medication has been re-prescribed for an existing instruction.
Reissuing of this prescription is not available without some intervention.
The planned administration has been cancelled prior to any administration.
The plan to order medication has been suspended.
The prescription has been cancelled but administration or dispensing may have occurred.
The administration of this medication has been ceased before anticipated completion.
The time to start this medication has been set.
The administration of a medication has been withheld and not given.
An administration of the medication was refused by the subject of care (patient).
The medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good which was the focus of the action. This element will normally be coded with a medicines terminology but free text may be required in some cases.

The reason(s) the specific action or step was carried out. Note: This is not the reason for the medication instruction, rather the specific reason e.g. for administration or for ceasing the medication.
The quantity of medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good.
Detailed information about the ingredient(s) including form and strength.
A comment on the action taken.
The sequence number specific to the action being recorded.
Assigned by the manufacturer to identify the manufacturing batch of the item.
Details about the administration of the medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good.
The name of the person to whom this was dispensed, if not the subject of care.

The number of times the medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good may still be dispensed without re-issue of a prescription or order. Note: This is the information required by the subject of care and prescriber.
Any instructions given to the subject of care or carer at the time of the action.
A dispensed medication is returned or not collected without use.
A different brand of the same medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good was substituted for the one nominated in the order.
The number of times this order has been dispensed. The sum of this number minus one and the remaining repeats provides the number of repeats on the original order.
The category of reimbursement or subsidy sought for the item.
A new instruction with changed dose or timing has been created that replaces this one.
The expiry date of the medicine administered as documented by the manufacturer.
The medication order has been changed in a manner which does not require a new instruction/order to be issued, according to local clinical rules.
The medication has been recommended, generally from one clinician to another, where the latter has the responsibility to order/authorise the medication.
*Details of use, administration, dispensing or other care step relating to a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good which may arise from an instruction from a clinician.(en)
*The medication is planned but no execution has taken place.(en)
*The instruction has issued as an item on a prescription.(en)
*The medication has been taken by the patient for the first time.(en)
*A single administration of the medication has taken place.(en)
*The medication has been completed as instructed.(en)
*The medication has not been dispensed as supply is not yet available.(en)
*The administration of the medication has been suspended.(en)
*The medication has been re-prescribed for an existing instruction.(en)
*Reissuing of this prescription is not available without some intervention.(en)
*The planned administration has been cancelled prior to any administration.(en)
*The plan to order medication has been suspended.(en)
*The prescription has been cancelled but administration or dispensing may have occurred.(en)
*The administration of this medication has been ceased before anticipated completion.(en)
*The time to start this medication has been set.(en)
Zdravilo, ki je bilo zadržano in ni bilo dano pacientu
Zdravilo, ki ni bilo dano pacientu zato, ker ga je pacient zavrnil
Ime osebe, komu je zdravilo razdeljeno
Število ponovnih izdaj zdravila za katere ni potrebno imeti dodatnega naročila. Te informacije lahko zahteva pacient ali predpisovalec zdravila.
Povrnjeno izdano zdravilo, ki ni bilo uporabljeno
Druga znamka zdravila z enakim učinkom
Število izdaj zdravila. Vsota tega števila in števila ponovitev izdaj predstavlja izdano količino originalnega naročila.
*A new instruction with changed dose or timing has been created that replaces this one.(en)
*The expiry date of the medicine administered as documented by the manufacturer.(en)
*The medication order has been changed in a manner which does not require a new instruction/order to be issued, according to local clinical rules.(en)
Действие, проистекающее из предписания врача, указавшего, как, когда, как долго и тд.
Применение лечения запланировано, но не выполнено
Лечение не подготовлено из-за отсутствия препарата

*The medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good which was the focus of the action. This element will normally be coded with a medicines terminology but free text may be required in some cases.(en)

*The category of reimbursement or subsidy sought for the item.(en)

فعل نابع من الأمر الدوائي, يتم كتابته بواسطة الطبيب السريري الذي يقوم بتحديد أي الأدوية يقوم بتناولها, متى و لأي مدة,, إلى آخره.
تم تخطيط استخدام الدواء و لكن لم يتم التنفيذ
تم تحويل الأمر إلى محل الصرف
تم بالفعل تناول الدواء بواسطة المريض
تم استكمال الدواء كما هو بالوصفة الطبية
لن يتم صرف الدواء حيث إنه غير متاح/متوفر
تم إعادة الأمر أو إعادة تفعيل الوصفة الطبية
تم إلغاء تناول الدواء الذي كان مخططا له
تم تعليق الخطة الخاصة بالأمر بالدواء
تم تحديد الوقت الخاص ببداية استخدام الدواء

una acción derivada de una orden de medicamentos creado por un médico que especifique qué medicamentos tomar, cuándo, por cuánto tiempo, etc
El medicamento se ha previsto para la administrcion, pero no ha tenido lugar aún
El pedido ha sido enviado a la enfermería o a la farmacia
El medicamento ha sido tomada por el paciente
El medicamento se ha completado según lo prescrito
El medicamento no se ha entregado o no está disponible
La administracion del medicamento ha sido suspendida
La medicacion ha sido renovada o prescripta nuevamente
No es posible la renovacion de esta medicacion
La prescipcion en curso a sido cancelada
La prescripcion enviada ha sido suspendida
La fecha para el inicio de la medicacion ha sido configurado
